data.title: Fun-loving Fraternities or Dangerous Violent Gangs?
data.meta_description: On Thursday, June 22nd my friend Ace texted me, “ Dee Snider from Twisted Sister stole your novel! He just came out with Frats about gangs with Greek names when he was growing up in Long Island.”…
data.text:
On Thursday, June 22nd my friend Ace texted me, “ Dee Snider from Twisted Sister stole your novel! He just came out with Frats about gangs with Greek names when he was growing up in Long Island.”

Gangs With Greek Names is the title of my novel about the same basic subject matter. Ace was joking, and I’m not accusing Snider of stealing my book, so cool your jets if you thought that’s where this was going.
